info.title: API Evangelist Building Block API
info.description: This is an API that provides access to the common building blocks used across the API space.

get.summary: Returns a screen capture of a url.
get.description: Returns PNG file returned from screen capture of a url.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: a url for screen capture

get.description: Returns an image with charcoal effect applied.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: radius setting for image filter

parameters.name: sigma
parameters.description: sigma setting for image filter

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: public url of image to be converted

get.description: Returns an image with oil painting effect applied.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: radius setting for image filter

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: public url of image to be converted

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: angle setting for image filter

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: url

get.description: Returns a list of all blog posts filtered by keyword.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: a text query to search across posts

get.summary: Retrieve a blog post using its ID

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the blog post to be returned

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the blog post to be returned

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id for application making calls

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: application key for application making calls

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: data to search by in the m/d/Y format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: how many posts to show

parameters.name: new
parameters.description: only show new apis (true / false)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: a text query to search across posts

get.description: Returns a list of all building blocks filtered by keyword.

parameters.description: the type of building blocks to pull
